game.name: RogueJack21
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: RogueJack21은 블랙잭에서 영감을 받은 덱빌더 게임으로, 당신은 덱을 구성하고 업그레이드하여 미친 듯이 강력한 핸드를 만들어 승산을 당신에게 유리하게 바꿉니다. 절차적으로 생성되는 카지노에서 전투를 벌이고, Noir City를 지배하며 당신에게 모든 것을 빼앗은 무자비한 마피아 The House에 복수하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: RogueJack21 is a Blackjack-inspired deckbuilder where you build and upgrade your deck to battle your opponents. Navigate through procedurally generated casinos and take revenge on The House, the ruthless mafia ruling Noir City that stole everything from you.
